channel.title: [PI] 317 Fishing Problem
channel.description:
[PI] 317 Fishing Problem
Hello, I am using teamtorva/torvapkz source. Please don't post saying "teamtorva is bad, don't use it" or "get another source" and etc. I don't want to switch sources, I just want the problems I'm having fixed. If you can help me with that, I thank you in advance, and, should you choose so, I will give you developer rank on my server. Thank you again.
Now, on with my problem.
When ever I try to fish at the skilling area, and when I click the fishing spot, nothing happens. I just stand there doing nothing. No messages, no errors, no nothing.
I hope you will be able to help me with my problem. Thank you.
ActionHandler.java: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/29863986/ActionHandler.java Fishing.java: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/29863986/Fishing.java

item.title: [PI] 317 Fishing Problem
item.dc:creator: @Aleyasu Aleyasu
item.description:
@Aleyasu wrote:

How would I go about setting that up in actionhandler then? Can anybody link me to a tutorial? What should I add/change in furstclicknpc and secondclicknpc?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 317 Fishing Problem
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:3, topic:445685”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=548521.msg4020938#msg4020938 date=1340017465]
In PI I’m 90% sure they handle fishing spots as NPCS, so you’ll need to make sure the firstClickNPC and secondClickNPC are set up correctly.
[/quote]
In every correct server, fishing spots are NPCs, because that is how Jagex made them. The reason for this is because fishing spots move. Even thought this is undoubtedly possible with objects, it is impractical on the large scale that RuneScape is.[/quote]

Ahh, I see.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 317 Fishing Problem
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Nothing happens.

Do you even have the fishing skill implemented?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 317 Fishing Problem
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

Ruby:

In PI I’m 90% sure they handle fishing spots as NPCS, so you’ll need to make sure the firstClickNPC and secondClickNPC are set up correctly.

In every correct server, fishing spots are NPCs, because that is how Jagex made them. The reason for this is because fishing spots move. Even thought this is undoubtedly possible with objects, it is impractical on the large scale that RuneScape is.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 317 Fishing Problem
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

In PI I’m 90% sure they handle fishing spots as NPCS, so you’ll need to make sure the firstClickNPC and secondClickNPC are set up correctly.
